title: What Holds People Back | Tom Bilyeu AMA
description: Tom answers questions from the community. Our Sponsors: Fundrise:  Get your first 3 months of fees waived by going to fundrise.com/impact Blinkist: Visit www.blinkist.com/IMPACT to try out the premium service completely free for 7 days! Skillshare:  Start learning on Skillshare today at skillshare.com/impact ButcherBox: Use the discount code: "IMPACT" at butcherbox.com to get 20$ off and FREE BACON You can submit your questions in advance to ama@impacttheory.com, with the subject line “AMA Question”. PEOPLE MENTIONED Maxwell Maltz [3:35] Joe Dispenza https://bit.ly/2ymJ40W  [3:39] Ed Mylett https://bit.ly/2CkGwAC  [3:45] David Meltzer https://bit.ly/2Lrchux  [24:42] Ben Greenfield [32:47] Hal Elrod [39:49] Simon Sinek https://bit.ly/2GvpHae  [43:20] Mother Teresa [49:44]   BOOKS MENTIONED New Psycho-cybernetics by Maxwell Maltz https://amzn.to/2S7BQ6D [3:33] You Are the Placebo by Joe Dispenza https://amzn.to/2R4CSmp [3:41] QUESTION TOPICS What holds people back from going all in [3:14] Why you need to be clear about your strategy in business and make sure you have a system for sustainability. [9:06] How Tom would split his time learning if he was 25 [14:07] How to bridge the gap between family and business and become “the decision maker” [16:30] What to do when you’re in debt [21:50] How to approach the mental health of family members with some tips for parenting [30:34] How to leverage your identity or a process to become the person you want to be [36:48] The difference between finding your why, building your passion, and choosing your mission [43:06]
